content:
This is the problem. White liberals think this can literally be solved by hugging or placating racists. HELL NO.

If a black person even attempted to go up to hug a white Trump supporter they would be shot or severely injured by others or police.

He must be crazy. I ain't hugging nobody who wants me and mine killed and gone, nor am I hugging anyone who supports people who want me and mine and ppl who look like me gone.,pic.twitter.com/tgWO9LMFOZ
They always have to enable their racist relatives instead of calling them out
